TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProfileGroupSettingsCollection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection
Public NotInheritable Class ProfileGroupSettingsCollection Inherits ConfigurationElementCollection

span.span: Contains a set of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含对象的集合 ，其中每个对象都包含一个对象的集合 。The class contains a collection of objects, which each contain a collection of objects. 类提供一种以编程方式创建、访问和修改添加到配置文件的节的子节的单个属性的定义的方法 `` `` 。The class provides a way to programmatically create, access, and modify the definition of an individual property added to the `` subsection of the `` section of a configuration file. ``配置文件的部分指定用户配置文件的架构。The `` section of the configuration file specifies a schema for user profiles. 在运行时，ASP.NET 编译系统使用部分中指定的信息 `` 来生成一个名为的类 `ProfileCommon` ，该类派生自 。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `` section to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . `ProfileCommon`类定义基于配置文件的节的子节中定义的属性 `` `` 。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `` subsection of the `` section of the configuration file. 有关配置文件属性的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Profile Properties 概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/2y3fs9xs(v=vs.100))。For more information about profile properties, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/2y3fs9xs(v=vs.100)). 有关 ASP.NET 版本2.0 中添加的配置文件功能的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/2y3fs9xs(v=vs.100))。For more information about the profile features added to ASP.NET version 2.0, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/2y3fs9xs(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的配置文件节选显示了如何以声明方式将的多个属性的值指定 为 `` `` `` 配置文件部分元素的元素。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the as `` elements of the `` element of the `` configuration file section. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将指令插入到 `clear` 配置文件的相应部分，以清除对更高级别配置文件中定义的元素的所有引用。This method inserts a `clear` directive into the appropriate section of the configuration file to clear all references to elements defined in a higher-level configuration file. 将删除当前配置文件的相应部分中定义的所有元素。All elements defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file are removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会将一个 `` 元素插入到配置文件的相应部分，该部分是在更高级配置文件中定义的任何元素。This method inserts a `` element into the appropriate section of the configuration file for any element defined in a higher-level configuration file. 如果在当前配置文件的相应部分中定义了元素，则会从配置文件中删除其条目。If the element is defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file, its entry is removed from the configuration file. 集合中必须存在要删除的对象。The object to remove must exist in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
